name: Saint Ferreol
summary:
Saint Ferreolus may refer to:Ferreolus of Besançon, priest and martyr, feast day June 16
Ferréol of Uzès (530–581), Catholic saint and bishop, feast day January 4
Ferréol of Grenoble, or Ferjus, Bishop of Grenoble
